trans-unit.resname: F15·5 | Abzan Beastmaster | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if you control the creature with the greatest toughness or tied for the greatest toughness.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，如果你操控防御力最大或与他者同为最大的生物，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: F15·6 | Frost Walker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME成为咒语或异能的目标时，将它牺牲。

trans-unit.resname: F15·9 | Orator of Ojutai | Card Name
F15·9 | Orator of Ojutai | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从你手上展示一张龙牌，以作为施放CARDNAME的额外费用。

trans-unit.resname: F15·9 | Orator of Ojutai | Card Text | Paragraph 2
F15·9 | Orator of Ojutai | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若于你施放CARDNAME时，你展示了龙牌或操控龙，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 5 damage to target creature without flying.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标不具飞行异能的生物造成5点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。
